creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: grey blanket made of six panels; rust, black and ivory horizontal stripes approx. 4-1/2" wide at each end; diamond motifs in rust stripe and four diamond motifs on each panel; tassels at ends of each panel and at ends of edges; diamond embroidered (?)
title: Blanket
